title: Ep. 985 - Elon Musk's War For Twitter
description:
Elon Musk mounts a hostile takeover of Twitter, the Republican National Committee ditches the Commission on Presidential Debates, and Ron DeSantis signs a major abortion ban in Florida.

New from DW Books: Fiery but Mostly Peaceful: The 2020 Riots and the Gaslighting of America. Pre-order your copy today: https://utm.io/uepi9.

If it seems like the world has gone insane, that’s because it has. Tune into Backstage to watch your favorite Daily Wire hosts make sense of it all: https://utm.io/uetoV
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
